abstracts.cdata!:
Complemented by reallocated funds from
            ongoing credits, the Cyclone Emergency Rehabilitation
            Project credit will help rebuild facilities damaged by the
            1994 cyclones and strengthen measures to minimize potential
            damage from future cyclones.  The overall rehabilitation
            program of which this project is a part, was designed in
            close coordination with the donor community. The IDA
            financed components were selected on the basis of: a) their
            economic and social priority as assessed by the Government
            and the Bank; b) the necessity to ensure the rapid
            restoration and operation of assets; c) the absence of other
            financing; and d) the feasibility of prompt reconstruction.
